short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a new wallpaper with a quote on each new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dhi Sutra Quote New Tab - Fresh Inspiration with Every New Tab!
(Dhi = inspired thought, Sutra = Collection of aphorisms)

Make your browsing experience more uplifting with Wallpaper Quote New Tab! This extension enhances every new tab with a stunning wallpaper and an inspiring quote, giving you a moment of motivation and reflection whenever you open a new tab.

Key Features:

üåÑ Beautiful Wallpapers: Enjoy a fresh, high-quality wallpaper every time you open a new tab.
üí¨ Inspirational Quotes: Each wallpaper comes with a thoughtfully curated quote to inspire your day.
üìñ Extra Meaning: Some quotes include deeper meanings or interpretations to spark reflection.
üìù Stored for Later: All quotes are stored locally, so you can access your favorite words of wisdom at any time.
Take a break from the usual blank tabs and enjoy an enriching and visually appealing experience with every click. Whether you're seeking motivation or just a moment of peace, Wallpaper Quote New Tab brings daily inspiration to your browsing routine.

Collector - Yaman K Singla (bit.ly/yaman-kumar)
